sections.title: Become a deco partner
sections.subtitle: Build and monetize AI agents and workflows – join deco's partner program and launch fast.
sections.trustSignalTitle: Who's Already Building with deco CMS

topBenefits.title: Win deals faster
topBenefits.description: Leverage deco to go from prompt to production seemlessly

topBenefits.title: Monetize your way
topBenefits.description: Commission, revenue share and marketplace in one billing system

bottomBenefits.title: Grow with us
bottomBenefits.description: listed as partner, co-marketing events, backlog priority

partnerTypes.title: Agentic Agencies
partnerTypes.description: you develop and deliver agentic software (AI Agents, Workflows, Views)

partnerTypes.title: ISVs
partnerTypes.description: you want to monetize useful piece of software on top of deco (MCPs, AI Apps, etc)

partnerTypes.title: Technology Partners
partnerTypes.description: you have an independent software that fits with deco (Cloud, Observability, etc)

requirements.text: At least 2 developers with valid certifications on https://deco.camp
1+ public or private AI published (MCP or better)
Last 30 day developer activity on our main open-source repository

sections.subtitle: highlights
sections.title: What you get

highlights.title: Find a partner listing
highlights.description: Get found on our find a partner page, ordered by results

highlights.title: Leads & co‑marketing
highlights.description: Referred directly by deco team & co-marketing 50/50

sections.targetTimeNote: Target time‑to‑first‑launch: < 7 days from sandbox access.

sections.subtitle: How to get started
sections.title: How the program works

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: tell us your focus, stacks, and preferred monetization.

steps.title: Enable
steps.description: get sandbox credits, Starter Kit, and certification schedule.

steps.title: Go‑to‑market
steps.description: register deals, request MDF, and publish case studies.

sections.tipText: Not sure where to start? Join a 20‑min intro call

processSteps.description: If approved: sandbox access + Starter Kit + certification invite.
If waitlisted: suggested steps to qualify (e.g., blueprint completion, cohort date).

faqItems.question: Do you provide customer leads?
faqItems.answer: Yes for Certified+ based on region, vertical fit, and bandwidth.

faqItems.question: Can we resell Deco?
faqItems.answer: Yes; discount by tier. L1 support by partner; Deco covers L2+.

faqItems.question: How do deal conflicts work?
faqItems.answer: Register deals for a 120‑day protection window (+60 with activity). Multi‑partner only with client consent or segmented scope.

faqItems.question: How do certifications work?
faqItems.answer: Tracks: DAS‑I, DCS, DIA. Badges expire in 18 months; maintain via launches + CPE or re‑test.

faqItems.question: Where can we see pricing?
faqItems.answer: Program benefits & tiers: /partners. Product pricing is handled per customer or via your reseller terms.

faqItems.question: Data privacy & deployment?
faqItems.answer: Projects run with RBAC and cost caps. Deploy to VPC or on‑prem as needed.

terms.title: Referral payouts
terms.description: within 30 days of Deco receiving first payment; cap at 12 months unless reseller.

terms.title: Reseller
terms.description: bills end‑customer; Deco bills partner; service/support split: L1 (partner) / L2+ (Deco).

terms.title: IP:
terms.description: pre‑existing stays with owner; new code defaults Apache‑2.0 (or agreed license).

terms.title: Brand usage:
terms.description: follow Deco brand guide; badges by tier/cert.

sections.title: Ready to build together?
sections.subtitle: Start your application now or grab time for a quick intro.

seo.title: Become a deco partner | Build and Sell Agentic Software
seo.description: Join the deco partner program and build AI-native experiences with our open-source runtime and Context CMS. Get sandbox credits, leads, certifications, and co-marketing opportunities.
seo.keywords: deco partners, AI software development, agentic software, partner program, system integrators, ISV partners, technology partners, AI workflows, agent development, Context CMS
